IndexPage.title: Text Clean,Text cleaner,Text Format,Txt Format,Format Online
IndexPage.description: Text-format is Text Formatting online tool to format text,clean text,remove line breaks,strip HTML,remove characters,uppercase,lowercase,replace text online.
IndexPage.keywords: Text Clean,Text cleaner,Text Format,Txt Format,remove characters,strip HTML,each line,replace text
IndexPage.pDescription: SoraWebui is an open-source project that simplifies video creation by allowing users to generate videos online with OpenAI's Sora model using text, featuring easy one-click website deployment.
IndexPage.fakeSoraTip: FakeSora is designed to simulate the yet-to-be-released OpenAI Sora API.
IndexPage.soraTip: OpenAI has not released Sora's API yet.

textClean.h1_desc: Text-Format is an all-in-one text cleaning and text formatting online tool that can perform many simple and complex text operations including format text, clean text, remove line breaks, strip HTML, convert case, find and replace text. Using Text-Format allows you to quickly get a clean and tidy text content without having to do tedious manual work.
textClean.default_text: Welcome to Text-Format. Paste your text here
textClean.line_to_left: to the left of each line.
textClean.line_to_right: to the right of each line.
textClean.h2_1_p: Text-Format is a powerful web-based tool designed to manipulate and format text according to user preferences. This tool offers a range of functionalities including the removal of punctuation, emojis, non-ASCII characters, and emails, as well as HTML tag manipulation and line-based operations. Whether you need to clean up text for analysis, prepare content for publication, or just enhance readability, Text-Format provides an intuitive interface and a comprehensive set of features to meet your text processing needs.
textClean.h2_2_p: Using Text-Format is straightforward and user-friendly. Here’s a step-by-step guide to help you get started:
textClean.h2_2_h3_1_p: Begin by pasting or typing your text into the provided text area on the webpage.
textClean.h2_2_h3_2_p: Check the boxes for the operations you want to apply to your text. The available operations include:
textClean.h2_2_h3_2_h4_1_p: Remove punctuation, strip emojis, remove non-ASCII characters, remove non-alphanumeric characters, and remove emails.
textClean.h2_2_h3_2_h4_2_p: Unescape HTML tags, remove all HTML tags, remove HTML IDs and classes, decode HTML character entities, and decode URL-encoded characters.
textClean.h2_2_h3_2_h4_3_p: Add specific text to the left or right of each line, remove characters from the left or right of each line.
textClean.h2_2_h3_2_h4_4_p: Find specific text and replace it with another, replace spaces with tabs or vice versa.
textClean.h2_2_h3_3_p: Once you’ve selected the desired operations, click the 'Clean Text' button to process the text according to your selections.
textClean.h2_2_h3_4_p: Use the buttons provided to perform additional actions like removing extra spaces, empty lines, or line breaks, changing case (uppercase, lowercase, capitalize sentences or words), removing duplicate lines, copying text to the clipboard, or clearing the text area.
textClean.h2_3_p_1: Text-Format offers a comprehensive suite of features designed to cater to all your text manipulation needs. Below is a detailed overview of the functionalities provided by Text-Format:
textClean.h2_3_h3_1_h4_1_p: Automatically strip all punctuation marks from your text to create a clean, streamlined document.
textClean.h2_3_h3_1_h4_2_p: emove all emojis from your text, ensuring that only alphanumeric characters and standard symbols remain.
textClean.h2_3_h3_1_h4_3_p: Eliminate all non-ASCII characters, which is especially useful for preparing text for systems that only support ASCII encoding.
textClean.h2_3_h3_1_h4_4_p: Strip out any characters that are not letters or numbers, resulting in purely alphanumeric text.
textClean.h2_3_h3_1_h4_5_p: Detect and remove email addresses from the text, useful for privacy concerns or data anonymization.
textClean.h2_3_h3_2_h4_1_p: Convert HTML entities back to their corresponding characters, making the text more readable.
textClean.h2_3_h3_2_h4_2_p: Strip all HTML tags from your text, leaving only the raw content.
textClean.h2_3_h3_2_h4_3_p: Remove ID attributes from HTML elements in the text, useful for cleaning up copied HTML code.
textClean.h2_3_h3_2_h4_4_p: Strip class attributes from HTML elements, simplifying the HTML structure.
textClean.h2_3_h3_2_h4_5_p: Replace HTML character entities with their actual characters, enhancing text readability.
textClean.h2_3_h3_2_h4_6_p: Convert URL-encoded characters back to their original form, making URLs and other encoded text easier to read.
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_1: Add Text to Left of Each Line
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_1_p: Add specific text to the beginning of each line, useful for formatting lists or code.
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_2: Add Text to Right of Each Line
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_2_p: Append text to the end of each line, useful for annotations or comments.
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_3: Remove Characters from Left of Each Line
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_3_p: Remove a specified number of characters from the beginning of each line.
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_4: Remove Characters from Right of Each Line
textClean.h2_3_h3_3_h4_4_p: Remove a specified number of characters from the end of each line.
textClean.h2_3_h3_4_h4_1_p: Search for specific text and replace it with another, useful for quick edits and corrections.
textClean.h2_3_h3_4_h4_2_p: Convert a specified number of consecutive spaces into a single tab character, useful for code formatting.
textClean.h2_3_h3_4_h4_3_p: Convert tabs into spaces, useful for adjusting indentation and spacing in text.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_1_p: Remove all extra spaces from the text, leaving only single spaces between words.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_2_p: Delete all empty lines from the text, useful for consolidating content.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_3_p: Convert line breaks into spaces, transforming multiline text into a single continuous line.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_4_p: Convert all characters in the text to uppercase.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_5_p: Convert all characters in the text to lowercase.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_6_p: Capitalize the first letter of each sentence, useful for proper formatting.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_7_p: Capitalize the first letter of each word.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_8_p: Eliminate duplicate lines from the text, leaving only unique lines.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_9_p: Easily copy the formatted text to the clipboard for use in other applications.
textClean.h2_3_h3_5_h4_10_p: Quickly clear all text from the input area, readying it for new content.
textClean.h2_3_p_2: By combining these powerful features, Text-Format allows users to effortlessly clean, format, and manipulate text, making it an indispensable tool for writers, editors, developers, data analysts, and more. Whether you need to prepare text for publication, coding, data analysis, or any other application, Text-Format provides the tools you need to get the job done efficiently.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy ｜ Text-Format
privacyPolicy.description: This Privacy Policy outlines how Text-Format collects, uses, and protects your information when you use our website.
privacyPolicy.desc: Thank you for choosing Text-Format! This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website located at text-format.com.
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pa: a. Personal Data: Text-Format operates entirely on the client-side and does not collect or store any personal data.
privacyPolicy.h4_1_pb: b. Non-Personal Data: We may use web cookies to enhance your browsing experience, but no personal data is collected or stored.
privacyPolicy.h4_2_p: Since Text-Format operates on the client-side, no data collection occurs, and all processing is done locally on your device.
privacyPolicy.h4_3_p: We do not share any data with third parties as no data is collected or stored by Text-Format.
privacyPolicy.h4_4_p: Text-Format does not collect any personal data from users, including children. All operations are conducted locally on the user's device.
privacyPolicy.h4_5_p: We will notify users of any updates to this Privacy Policy by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page.
privacyPolicy.h4_6_p: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service ｜
termsOfService.desc: These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of SoraWebui (the "Service"), provided by SoraWebui ("we" or "us"). By accessing or using the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
termsOfService.h4_1_p: SoraWebui provides a browser interface for OpenAI Sora, allowing users to generate text-to-video easily.
termsOfService.h4_2_p: The ownership of the video generated from the text belongs to the original user.
termsOfService.h4_3_p: We collect and store user data including name, email, and payment information. We handle this data in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.h4_4_p: We use web cookies to collect non-personal data. For more information, please refer to our Privacy Policy.
termsOfService.h4_5_p: Our Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and disclose information about you. By using our Service, you agree to our Privacy Policy, which can be found at
termsOfService.h4_6_p: These Terms are governed by the laws of the United States of America.
termsOfService.h4_7_p: We may update these Terms from time to time. We will notify users of any material changes via email.
termsOfService.h4_8_p: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, please contact us at

indexQuestion.h2_1_p1: OpenAI's Sora model is an advanced AI designed to convert text into video.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p2: It generates realistic and imaginative scenes based on text descriptions, creating multiple characters and accurately simulating specific motions and scene details.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p3: Impressive in language understanding and video production, Sora offers creative professionals a new tool for innovation.
indexQuestion.h2_1_p4: For more detailed information, visit OpenAI's official website
indexQuestion.h2_2_p1: SoraWebui is an open-source web platform that enables users to generate videos from text using OpenAI's Sora model.
indexQuestion.h2_2_p2: It simplifies the video creation process, allowing for easy deployment and use.
indexQuestion.h2_2_p3: With SoraWebui, anyone can create videos by simply inputting text, making it an accessible tool for both professionals and enthusiasts in video production and AI technology.
indexQuestion.h2_2_p4a: For more information, you can visit the SoraWebui website
